summary:
Image credit: TESRenewal modding group

While this is good news for the Skyblivion team and all those looking forward to the project's release (which is slated for some time this year), Bethesda itself has said it has no plans for Oblivion Remastered official mod support. Meanwhile since its release last night, The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered has pulled in some impressive player numbers for Bethesda and co-developer Virtuos. It additionally thanked the studio for the Oblivion Remastered game keys Bethesda gifted the entire modding team.
